title: Start Kubernetes proxy server automatically
content:
sudo nano /etc/systemd/system/kube_proxy.service

Add the service content:

[Unit]
Description=kubectl proxy 8080
After=snap-microk8s-1214.mount network.target

[Service]
User=root
ExecStart=/bin/bash -c "/snap/bin/microk8s.kubectl proxy --address='0.0.0.0' --port=8080 --accept-hosts='.*'"
StartLimitInterval=0
RestartSec=10
Restart=always

[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target

sudo systemctl daemon-reload

sudo systemctl start kube_proxy.service 

sudo systemctl enable kube_proxy.service
